problem_text:
a) Let AB be a Frobenius group with kernel A and complement B. Suppose that AB acts on a finite group G so that GA is also a Frobenius group with kernel G and complement A. Is the nilpotency class of G bounded in terms of |B| and the class of CG(B)?
V. D. Mazurov
answer: a) Yes, it is (N. Yu. Makarenko, P. Shumyatsky, Proc. Amer. Math. Soc., 138 (2010), 3425–3436).
